title: The TRUTH About Fantasy RBs: Part 1 + Playoff Reactions - Fantasy Football Podcast for 1/25
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with more TRUTH to deliver!! On today’s fantasy football podcast, it’s a deep dive into the top fantasy running backs from the 2021 season. Who was the most consistent? Who had a high fantasy finish but was hard to rely on weekly? Plus, reactions to the Divisional Round of the NFL Playoffs. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for January 25th, 2022.

(3:45) - Playoff Reactions
(9:00) - NFL News
(15:05) - The TRUTH About Fantasy RBs
(19:35) - Jonathan Taylor
(26:30) - Austin Ekeler
(30:45) - Joe Mixon
(34:25) - Najee Harris
(38:20) - James Conner
(42:15) - Ezekiel Elliott
(47:55) - Leonard Fournette
(51:05) - Alvin Kamara
(55:25) - Cordarrelle Patterson
(58:55) - Antonio Gibson
